subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: David Krejci and Dennis Wideman scored 25 seconds apart in the third period, lifting the N.H.L.-leading Boston Bruins to a victory over the Philadelphia Flyers.
snippet: David Krejci and Dennis Wideman scored 25 seconds apart in the third period, lifting the N.H.L.-leading Boston Bruins to a victory over the Philadelphia Flyers.
